content: this intermediate-level pattern offers a fun and engaging project for crocheters looking to expand their skills the set comes in a range of sizes from newborn to adult ensuring that everyone can enjoy the cozy warmth and trendy design the pinerolo accessories set is perfect for gifting or treating yourself to a handmade wardrobe upgrade **unique features-** includes patterns for cowl beanie and fingerless gloves sizes available from newborn to adult worked in the round for seamless construction features ribbed and textured stitches for added interest written pattern with clear instructions for intermediate crocheters **materials needed-** yarn lion brand jeans worsted weight yarn 484-730 yards stitch markers hook 5 5mm us size 9 0 gauge 16 stitches by 10 5 row = 4 inches in double_crochet
